location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Copy of letter No 1649/456 of 1872 from Colonel Lewis Pelly, HBM's Political Resident in the Persian Gulf, at Bombay, to The Secretary to Government, Political Department, Bombay

mods.abstract: Letter enclosing a letter, No. A/192 of 1872, concerning Turco-Wahabee affairs at Bahrain and also enclosing a translation of a letter from Hajee Ahmed Khan as well as summaries of native reports received from Lahsah [Hasa].None of the enclosures are with the letter in the file.
